author: craigmcc
msg: Allow CallStep, when nested in a block, to call another Activity and return,
without throwing a ClassCastException.  Previously, the code was assuming
we were directly under an Activity; now, the stack is searched.
This is a simplified version of the submitted patch, making the caller
responsible for deciding whether getOwner() returns an Activity or not,
and thus avoids modifying the public API of the Step interface (which
Submitted By:  Colin Sharples <sharples AT nz1.ibm.com>
Submitted By:  Edmund Taylor <bmi_etaylor AT yahoo.com>
